Webb Creek Sawmill

Welcome to Webb Creek Sawmill

Locally produced rough cut lumber and beams.

Products

Rough Cut Boards

Choose your wood type, length, and width. We will cut any amount from 1 board up to full contractor orders. Prices vary on linear foot and wood type.

Custom Beams

Quality, beautiful beams for structure or embellishment. Many wood types, lengths, and thickness available. Prices vary on linear foot and wood type.

Live Edge Slabs

Live edge slabs are the perfect table or counter top. Smaller widthe make handsome shelves. Prices vary on linear foot and wood type.

About

Webb Creek Sawmill was opened in 1998 by Jake Bonner in Clearwater County. In 2020 the business moved to Nez Perce County. Jake has decades of experience as a lumberjack and running a sawmill. From start to finish these custom lumber products are small business produced.
